MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK7 postcode area of Stirling. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:00am due to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:43am on Friday, 16 April 2021
